about_the_game:
Gold and Glory is a classic exploration game developed specifically for VR. Explore a tidal cave! Discover the treasures of a derelict pirate ship! Fight off the peculiar creatures that dwell in this strange and magical place! Navigate the perils of the place using VR motion controllers. Climb around and explore inside this mysterious world, and seize your gold and glory!



Think Tomb Raider: climb and problem-solve your way through this place in VR in order to reveal the treasure that lies within. While the premise seems simple enough, the treasure has been sitting in the dark for untold seasons, and it won't be an easy feat to acquire it. You aren't alone in this place, and those that dwell here are not happy to see you!



  • Realistic climbing along treacherous cliffs and fling yourself across ravines!
  • Hands-on combat with bow and dagger!
  • Single Player Campaign split into manageable and bite-sized auto-checkpoints
  • Collect Treasures strewn around this forgotten place
  • Built exclusively to take advantage of VR and motion controllers
